#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x);
using namespace std;
typedef long long int lli;
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main()
{
	int t,n,m,a[100005],b[100005],i,l,r,c;
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanint(n);
		scanint(m);
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
			scanint(a[i]);
		memset(b,0,sizeof(b));
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			scanint(l);
			scanint(r);
			b[l]++;
			b[r+1]--;
		}
		c=0;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			c+=b[i];
			a[i]+=c;
			printf("%d ",a[i]);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
}
